Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1986...
Injured on 8/13/1987 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/1/1989 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1993, off Tommy Boggs (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/1993, off Zane Smith (CLE)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1993, hitting .522 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Boston on 5/28/1995...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (A) on 5/26/1998...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1998, hitting .600 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
